short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Firefox WebExtension reminding you to breathe, or anything else.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remember to breathe. This extension shows you a simple message of your choice every time you open a new tab. You can create a list of messages that the extension will randomly choose from. You can also change the colors and fonts of the message.
